text:
**To reproduce:**

```
cd examples/manipulating_visualizing  
python plot_demo_more_plotting.py
git status
```

**Expected:**
This will plot some things, even save some files, but not indicate anything changed in the source tree

**Current behavior:**
![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/4072455/5675963/b7eda1c4-9780-11e4-8e8f-b417b8bf7fe9.png)

**Suggested Fix:**
Add these to an `examples/.gitignore` file.  This happens for other file types as well (`*.nii`, `*.nii.gz`)

I have this fix on my machine now.
title: Examples create output files in source directories that aren't .gitignore'd
Examples create output files in source directories that aren't .gitignore'd
